customSolution.name: Azure Cost Analytics

customSolution.author: volkanc@microsoft.com

| where Tags.[tagkey]==tagvalue

;

| union (data

    | project Id = RequestId, Name = TagValue, Usage, Kind = 'Tags'),
    (data
    | summarize Usage=sum(Usage) 
    | project Id = "Overall", Name = "Subs Total", Usage, Kind = 'Overall'
       ),
       (data
    | summarize Usage=sum(Usage) by RequestId, ResourceId , ResName
    | project Id = ResourceId, Name = ResName, Usage, Kind = 'Resource');
    nodes
| union (links)
